document.full_text: syrian president bashar al-assad, facing a wave of protests demanding greater freedoms, took steps on thursday toward addressing grievances including lifting emergency law and granting disenfranchised kurds rights.
document.title: syria's assad takes steps towards reforms
lines_and_colors: syrian president bashar al-assad, facing a wave of protests demanding greater freedoms, took steps on thursday toward addressing grievances including lifting emergency law and granting disenfranchised kurds rights.
